column1: Table 34. Percent distribution of victimizations, by type of crime and relationship to offender
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 34. Family violence, 2005:  Percent distribution of victimizations, by type of crime and relationship to offender
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes data on offenders well known to the victim whose relationship to the victim could not be ascertained.
b/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
